alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Garfield (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:43PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Garfield, southeastern Valley and northwestern McCone Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 441 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Duck Creek Rec Area, or 19 miles south of Glasgow, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs, blow around unsecured objects and generate large waves on Fort Peck Lake. Locations impacted include... Fort Peck, The Pines Rec Area, Fort Peck Marina, Frazer, Duck Creek Rec Area, Rock Creek Rec Area, Oswego and Park Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on Fort Peck Lake, consider moving toward shore.
